CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 所有；所有人；所有物；全部；一切；全体；整体；全数
所有的；全部的；一切的；整个的；全体的；无论何种的；任何可能的；（某一体征）显著突出的
完全地；全部地；全然；整个地；无一例外地；一直；始终；同样地（指程度或数量）；相同地（指比分或得分）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 与complete用法相近，但强调总量。
除了有whole的意思外，还强调既不能加一个也不减少一个的含义。
侧重指未打折扣，未除去成本或皮重等与净重、净数相对。
侧重指内容，含有能包括所有的充足内容的意味。
强调事物在内容、程度、或数量方面已完整，已达标准。
比entire更普通，强调每个组成部分都包括在内，无一漏掉或舍去。

word_group.brief_definition: 最重要的是, 首先；除…之外
突然, 忽然；一起, 同时
满意的, 良好的；对, 是的；好吧
众所周知；正如我们所知
各个年龄；老少皆有；各个年龄段
遍及；遍布各地；四散蔓延
糟糕的是；最糟糕；最恶劣
(回答道谢的客套语)不用谢, 哪儿的话；一点也不

bilingual.source: He gave all his money to charity.
bilingual.target: 他把全部的钱都捐给了慈善机构。

bilingual.source: All my heart, all the joy ooh baby, baby please.
bilingual.target: 我整个的心，全部的快乐哦宝贝，（让）宝贝喜欢。

bilingual.source: All that i am is worth a dime
bilingual.target: 我全部的财产也就是一个一毛钱硬币
我们收取全部的膳食费用。

bilingual.source: Know ye, O man, that all exists.
bilingual.target: 知道呀，哦人类，全部的存在。
墨菲的书上有全部的数据。

bilingual.source: The still sow eats up all the draff.
bilingual.target: 不声不响的猪吃光全部的饲料.

bilingual.source: One day all 10 suns came out at once.
bilingual.target: 一天全部的10个太阳一次出现了。

bilingual.source: To you, sweetheart, with all my love.
bilingual.target: 我把全部的爱都献给你, 心上的人儿.

list.abstract: all，英文单词，作形容词、代词或副词，翻译为所有的、一切、全部等等。
all是一个医学用语，是急性淋巴细胞白血病的代号。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the maze. All of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是迷宫，全部的。

yingyinNormal.en: Quick question. Do you mean just Instagram, or all my social...? All of them! Okay, deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问一下。你是单指照片分享网，还是所有社交网...？全部的！好，说定了。

yingyinNormal.en: I know! We should pool all our money and buy the Knicks!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道了！我们该把全部的钱凑起来，买下尼克队！

yingyinNormal.en: All of them? All of them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个吗？整个。

yingyinNormal.en: All the time? All the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多事？可多了。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, get in. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，上车吧。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you hit it! All right. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还不出手。好的，好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Central Park? Yeah. All of us. All day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中央公园？对，大家一起，去个一整天。

yingyinNormal.en: All of us in here, we've all been exposed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都在这里，我们都暴露在病菌之下了。

yingyinNormal.en: Aren't we all in grave danger all the time?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不是随时都有极大的危险吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my God. It's all right. It's all right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，天哪。没事的。

yingyinNormal.en: That's all you wanted to ask me? That's all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是你想问我的事？对，就这样。

yingyinNormal.en: I see all and know all. What are your names?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无所不见，无所不知，你们叫什么？

yingyinNormal.en: All right. It's all right. Come and sit down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧好吧，好吧。一切都很好，过来坐下。

yingyinNormal.en: We all think that at first. We are all wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们一开始都这么以为。但我们都错了。

yingyinNormal.en: Attention! All right. All right. Everybody sit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全体都有好了！好了，都坐下。

yingyinNormal.en: It'll be all right now. You'll be all right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没事了。没事了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you're all the same. Detention, all of you!
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，你们都一样。你们全体留堂！

yingyinNormal.en: All right. All right. Just keep him away from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，叫他离我远点就是了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, Phoebe, you look great. All right all ready.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比，你看起来好美好啦。早知道了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 全部; 一切; 所有

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 据说；根据各种流传的说法
不惜一切代价；不计代价

sense_info_list.zh: 全部; 一切; 所有

examination_example.sentence: Certainly, it's incredibly hard to maintain patience at <highlight>all</highlight> times with your children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，你很难在任何时候都对你的孩子保持耐心。

examination_example.sentence: This is a skill that will help them <highlight>all</highlight> throughout life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一项终生受益的技能。

examination_example.sentence: When education becomes one-size-fits-<highlight>all</highlight>, it risks overlooking a nation's diversity of gifts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当教育变得一刀切时，它就有忽视一个国家天赋多样性的风险。

examination_example.sentence: The recognition given to him for his work were <highlight>all</highlight> bound up with the class politics of the army at the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他工作的认可都与当时军队的阶级政治有关。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>all</highlight> very well train operators trumpeting the improvements they are making to the network.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 铁路运营商大肆宣扬他们正在改善铁路网络，这是很好的。

examination_example.sentence: After <highlight>all</highlight>, other countries, such as Australia and Britain, have started liberalizing their legal professions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕竟，其他国家，如澳大利亚和英国，已经开始将他们的法律职业自由化。

examination_example.sentence: I knew that no one could imagine me in the fashion industry at <highlight>all</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道根本没有人会想象我能进入时尚行业！

examination_example.sentence: These made him <highlight>all</highlight> the more determined to succeed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些都让他更加坚定了成功的决心。

examination_example.sentence: One oft-debated cure for this labor shortage remains as implausible as it's been <highlight>all</highlight> along.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一直以来，人们争论不休的解决劳动力短缺问题的方法都是难以置信的。

examination_example.sentence: When you start conversation from there and then move outwards, you'll find <highlight>all</highlight> of a sudden that the conversation becomes a lot easier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你从共同点开启对话，然后向外拓展，你会突然发现对话变得容易多了。

examination_example.sentence: If you are a writer, that means—above <highlight>all</highlight>—writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你是一名作家，这意味着——最重要的是——写作。

word_usage.usage:
all可以与复数名词与不可数名词连用，表示“所有、全部、一切”之义，名词前可用the、this、that、my、her、his等。与单数名词连用，表示某事在某段时间内持续发生，指“全部的，整个的”
例：He's worked hard all year. 他一年到头都在辛勤劳动。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不惜一切代价；在所不惜

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>All</highlight> too often, people give up at the first hurdle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多时候，人们在第一个障碍就放弃了。

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>all</highlight> my essays are in there, and I need to hand them in before we break for the Christmas holidays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我所有的论文都在里面，我得在圣诞节放假前交上去。

examination_example.sentence: If you were in a management or leadership position, when discussing your current role, never take <highlight>all</highlight> the credit for accomplishments or achievements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你处于管理或领导的位置，当讨论你目前的角色时，千万不要把所有的功劳或成就都归于自己。

examination_example.sentence: As the saying goes, it is better not to believe in books at <highlight>all</highlight>, rather than to believe in them implicitly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 俗话说，与其对书半信半疑，不如完全不相信书。

examination_example.sentence: Those who take after-school music, those who do after-school sports, and those with no structured after-school program at <highlight>all</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些参加课外音乐活动的，参加课外体育活动的，还有完全没有课外活动的人。

word_usage.usage:
all用作代词时意为“全部（人/事）”，表示人时，后接动词需用复数形式；表示事态、总量或抽象概念时，后接动词需用单数形式。
示例：All were silent.
大家都沉默了。
All was silent.
万籁俱寂。

在人称代词之前只能用all of，不能用all，且人称代词要用宾格。
示例：我们大家都很开心。
误 All us were happy.
误 All we were happy.
正 All of us were happy.

用all时指三个及以上的人或物（包括一群人），指两个人或物时，用both。
示例：John, Henry and Robert all came.
John and Henry both came.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 通常用于修饰单数或复数可数名词、不可数名词、物质名词、表示地点的专有名词, 放在冠词、指示代词、物主代词等之前, 而 whole 放在这些词之后。有时可与 whole, entire 和 total 换用。
强调事物在内容、程度、或数量方面已完整, 已达标准。
较正式用词, 只作定语, 一般只用于修饰单数名词(包括集合名词), 强调团体、时间段、数量等的整体, 含不能有所削减或增添之意, 用于修饰某一具体事物时常可与 whole 互换。
侧重指内容, 含有能包括所有的充足内容的意味。
侧重指未打折扣, 未除去成本或皮重等与净重、净数相对。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 全部地; 完全; 都
唯一; 全是; 仅仅

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 最重要的是；首先；除…之外
满意的；良好的；对；是的；好吧
(告别用语或书信结语)祝一切顺利；万事如意
最好地；最好的是；最妙的是

examination_example.sentence: But like <highlight>all</highlight> performances, there are moments when things go wrong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但就像所有的表演一样，终归会有出错的时候。

examination_example.sentence: It took us about 3 hours to go <highlight>all</highlight> the way around the Xi'an City Wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们花了大约3个小时走完西安城墙。

examination_example.sentence: Tyson left for college, so I had to start at a new school <highlight>all</highlight> by myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 泰森去上大学了，所以我只能一个人去新学校。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>All</highlight> we have to do is to finish the last bit of work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们所要做的就是完成最后一点工作。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>All</highlight> across the country, recovery centers have begun building Healing Gardens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全国各地的康复中心已经开始建造康复花园。

examination_example.sentence: But above <highlight>all</highlight>, we want to spend some time with you and your family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但最重要的是，我们想花点时间陪你和你的家人。

sense_info_list.zh: 全部地; 完全; 都

examination_example.sentence: As I told my parents at dinner that first night, it was <highlight>all</highlight> a little more high-pressure than I'd expected .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像我在第一天晚餐时告诉父母的那样，这一切的压力比我预想的要大一些。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>all</highlight> want to hope things will turn out fine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都希望事情会好转。

examination_example.sentence: Those are <highlight>all</highlight> bad for you, but you can have porridge, bread, and orange juice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些对你都不好，但你可以喝粥、吃面包、喝橙汁。

sense_info_list.zh: 唯一; 全是; 仅仅

word_usage.usage:
复数名词前加the表示特定的事物，不加 the 则表示泛指：
All the dogs have long ears.
那些狗的耳朵都很长。
All dogs have keen ears.
所有狗的耳朵都很灵敏。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (用于强调)完全; 遍及; 一直
(all at once/all of a sudden)突然

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 最重要的是；首先；除…之外
满意的；良好的；对；是的；好吧
众所周知；正如我们所知
各个年龄；老少皆有；各个年龄段
遍及；遍布各地；四散蔓延
糟糕的是；最糟糕；最恶劣
彻底；完全；各方面；为（或由）每个人
(回答道谢的客套语)不用谢；哪儿的话；一点也不
我们全体；我们所有人；我们都
自古以来；有史以来；从未有过
几乎所有；几乎全部；几乎一切

examination_example.sentence: More than one-third of <highlight>all</highlight> food created in the U.S. is wasted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超过三分之一在美国生产的食物被浪费了。

examination_example.sentence: First of <highlight>all</highlight>, you should always keep in mind what you hope to complete by the end of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，你应该始终牢记那些你希望在它结束时完成的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Every school day, we use schoolbags to carry <highlight>all</highlight> of our things to school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天上学，我们都用书包把所有的东西带到学校。

sense_info_list.zh: (用于强调)完全; 遍及; 一直

examination_example.sentence: This is perhaps why volunteers <highlight>all</highlight> around the world keep doing what they do - their work is "priceless".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也许就是为什么全世界的志愿者都在坚持做他们该做的事情——他们的工作是“无价的”。

examination_example.sentence: Maybe I can't finish digging <highlight>all</highlight> the way through the earth, but look at what I have found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许我不能一路挖完整个地面，但看看我发现了什么。

examination_example.sentence: You will be puzzled <highlight>all</highlight> the way through and a little bored from time to time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会一路都感到困惑，也会时不时觉得有点无聊。

examination_example.sentence: We don't know each other at <highlight>all</highlight>, but the bright smiles bring us closer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们根本不认识彼此，但灿烂的笑容让我们更亲近。

examination_example.sentence: He has been working with them since he was a little boy and he's not afraid at <highlight>all</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从小就和他们一起工作，一点也不害怕。

examination_example.sentence: How could we believe he gave us so much information about an animal that had not been there at <highlight>all</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们怎么能相信他给了我们这么多关于一种根本不存在的动物的信息呢？

examination_example.sentence: That's <highlight>all</highlight> right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没关系。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>All</highlight> right. See you!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的。再见！

sense_info_list.zh: (all at once/all of a sudden)突然

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>All</highlight> at once he pulled his horse to stop．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他突然拉着马停下来。

examination_example.sentence: The earthquake happened <highlight>all</highlight> of a sudden, but luckily no one was injured in the village.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地震突然发生了，但幸运的是村里没有人受伤。

word_usage.usage:
all用作代词时意为“全部（人/事）”，表示人时，后接动词需用复数形式；表示事态、总量或抽象概念时，后接动词需用单数形式。
示例：All were silent.
大家都沉默了。
All was silent.
万籁俱寂。

在人称代词之前只能用all of，不能用all，且人称代词要用宾格。
示例：我们大家都很开心。
误 All us were happy.
误 All we were happy.
正 All of us were happy.

用all时指三个及以上的人或物（包括一群人），指两个人或物时，用both。
示例：John, Henry and Robert all came.
John and Henry both came.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“两者都” both... and...意为“...和...（两者）都”。
意为“两者中任何一个”。either...or...意为“或者…或者……；要么……要么……”。
意为“两者都不”，是both的反义词。neither... nor...意为“既不...也不...”。
表示“三者或三者以上的人或物都”。
表示“三者或三者以上的人或物都不”，是all的反义词。
